action-view.name: action-question-view-linked-ranges
action-view.title: Linked ranges
action-view.domain: :questionId in (SELECT rq.question.id FROM RangeQuestion rq WHERE rq.rangeVal = self)

action-view.name: action-question-view-linked-intervention-types
action-view.title: Linked intervention types
action-view.domain: :questionId in (SELECT rq.question.id FROM RangeQuestion rq WHERE rq.rangeVal.id in self.advancedStartupMonitoringRange.id) OR :questionId in (SELECT rq.question.id FROM RangeQuestion rq WHERE rq.rangeVal.id in self.headerRangeList.rangeVal.id) OR :questionId in (SELECT rq.question.id FROM RangeQuestion rq WHERE rq.rangeVal.id in self.equipmentRangeList.rangeVal.id) OR :questionId in (SELECT rq.question.id FROM RangeQuestion rq WHERE rq.rangeVal.id in self.footerRangeList.rangeVal.id)
